description: Choose a Quora topic and get info about its influencers
argumentDescription: Insert your Quora topic name, Session cookie ms & Session cookie mb

ms.placeholder: Cookie used by Quora website (name: m-s)
ms.label: m-s Quora cookie (?)

mb.placeholder: Cookie used by Quora website (name: m-b)
mb.label: m-b Quora cookie (?)

topic.label: Quora topic (be carefull, the topic is case sensitive) / Spreadsheet URL (?)
topic.helper: Enter either a Google Spreadsheet URL, CSV URL (make sure your file is publicly available) make sure your file is publicly available

columnName.label: Colum name where Quora topics URLs are stored in the spreadsheet
columnName.helper: If empty, the first column of your spreadsheet will be used

outputDescription.avatarUrl: URL where the Quora avatar is stored
outputDescription.answerViews: Total count of views for all articles wrote by the writer
outputDescription.answers: Count of answers by the writer for all of his topics
outputDescription.blogs: Count of blogs for the writer
outputDescription.following: Count of people followed by the writer
outputDescription.topics: Count of topics, where the writer interacts
outputDescription.edits: Count of edits by the writer
outputDescription.followerYouKnow: Name & profile Url of people who follow you and the writer
